attributes.action: admit the mess he and Gordon Brown have got the country in with immigration, iraq, public service cuts and and spiralling taxes education and just about everything they  else they have done.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government must be the worst government ever. All they are concerned about is fleecing honest hard working people, families and motorists waste it on lost causes and they take no notice of public opinion. It is a waste of time being a conciencious citizen and trying to prepare for the future as this government want to take it all away from you.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
